conventional.message: feat(api): add REST endpoints for user management
fix: repair memory leak in connection pool
fix(parser): handle null values in JSON responses

conventional.breakingChange: OAuth 1.0 is no longer supported. Migrate to OAuth 2.0.

multiline.subject: feat: add comprehensive logging system
multiline.body:
This commit adds a new logging system with the following features:

- Configurable log levels (debug, info, warn, error)
- Structured logging with JSON output
- Automatic log rotation
- Performance metrics tracking

BREAKING CHANGE: Logger constructor signature has changed. Use new Logger({ level: 'info' }) instead of new Logger('info').

realWorld: feat: add custom domain configuration for GitHub Pages
fix: correct README.md architecture diagram to match actual flat file structure
docs: update documentation dates to accurate values
refactor: extract magic numbers to named constants (MAX_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH = 200)
test: add unit tests for retry logic
build: update build configuration for production
ci: add GitHub Actions workflow for automated releases

fix: repair 中文 unicode support
feat: add authentication: OAuth and JWT support
